title: A Composition in steel by Todd Pendleton with Jack Pendleton
creator_credit: James Klebau Productions and James Klebau
brief_description: The film shows the two Pendleton brothers, Todd and Jack, making a steel sculpture starting from the initial design in chalk on a metal base, then the selection, cutting and the beating of the scrap metal to shape. Finally they weld the shapes together modifying the design as they go.
